[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_fullwidth_code _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_color=”#282c35″][/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Popup – #undefined” _builder_version=”4.7.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||2px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

In the media

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||align-items: center;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dagens Industri – %22Svenskarna säljer in sin plattform till spansk fotbollsjätte – Paradoxgrundaren investerar%22″ url=”https://digital.di.se/artikel/hans-digitala-fotbolls-coach-kops-in-av-la-liga-jatten-paradoxgrundaren-investerar” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2021/01/didigital.jpg” module_class=”press-blurb” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” link_option_url=”https://digital.di.se/artikel/hans-digitala-fotbolls-coach-kops-in-av-la-liga-jatten-paradoxgrundaren-investerar”]

Some player development, another part club administration and soon a larger part fintech. This is the basis of the football platform “360Player” – which is now spread around the world through big clubs such as Athletic Bilbao. “We will develop the service for other sports as well,” says founder Mats Kraitsik.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;”][et_pb_blurb title=”Fotbollskanalen – Fotbollslabbet ” url=”https://www.fotbollskanalen.se/fotbollslabbet/tv-aldersdiskriminering-inom-fotbollen-alla-blir-lidande-har/” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2021/01/fotbollskanalen.png” module_class=”press-blurb” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding=”|||0px|false|false” link_option_url=”https://www.fotbollskanalen.se/fotbollslabbet/tv-aldersdiskriminering-inom-fotbollen-alla-blir-lidande-har/” custom_css_before=”display: flex;||” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||”]

The numbers speak for themselves.
Talents born late in the year do not get the same opportunities.
In the Football Lab, they go in depth – and suggest an alternative solution together with 360Player.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||align-items: center;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dagens Industri – %22Tränarlegendarens nya satsning – sportapp för spelarutveckling%22″ url=”https://digital.di.se/artikel/tranarlegendens-nya-satsning-sportapp-for-spelarutveckling” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2021/01/didigital.jpg” module_class=”press-blurb” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” link_option_url=”https://digital.di.se/artikel/tranarlegendens-nya-satsning-sportapp-for-spelarutveckling”]

360Player will help clubs and national teams to develop players. Now they bring in new capital for launch and a coaching legend and TV profile joins the board.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Press releases

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blog_extras include_categories=”113″ blog_layout=”block_extended” featured_image_size=”medium” excerpt_length=”200″ show_more=”off” show_author=”off” show_categories=”off” show_comments=”off” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h4″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_blog_extras][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
